title: A Boy Who Was Picked Up by the Dragon King and Mastered Magic - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Dragons   Magic   Male Protagonist
author: こはるんるん
description:
Cal has tried hard to overcome the curse by mastering the lost chantless magic. However, when he turned 14, his father disliked him and abandoned him on a deserted island where dragons nest.

There, Cal is picked up by the legendary Dark Dragon King Altina, and his talent awakens.>
